data: {"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3145699,"name":"Walter","username":"TwistedBlizzard","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/t/77aa72/{size}.png","created_at":"2023-02-15T03:06:55.622Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eOur team is trying to use sysid for robot characterization. We just got a new Pigeon 2.0 from CTRE. I used phoenix tuner to update the firmware and to make sure it blinked, which was all successful.\u003cbr\u003e\nWhen I ran all the drivetrain angular tests in Sysid, it says that the gyro delta angle was 0 degrees, which I assume is wrong since the robot was physically rotating. I made sure that the CAN ID specified in the generator was the same as in phoenix tuner. I also tried printing out the GetYaw value from the gyro in our code, and that was printing out values. Any help would be appreciated.\u003c/p\u003e","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":2,"updated_at":"2023-02-15T03:06:55.622Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":4,"reads":24,"readers_count":23,"score":39.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":426864,"topic_slug":"incorrect-delta-gyro-angle-shown-in-sysid","display_username":"Walter","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":55239,"hidden":false,"trust_level":1,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/incorrect-delta-gyro-angle-shown-in-sysid/426864/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3309865,"name":"system","username":"system","avatar_template":"/uploads/default/original/4X/9/3/2/93234578e69f55873c63fc00fe2d0d85f23bce55.png","created_at":"2024-02-15T03:07:07.229Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eThis topic was automatically closed 365 days after the last reply.
